# Document Templates

This folder contains reusable templates and examples for creating reports and documentation for Project D.

## Contents

| Template | Purpose | Usage |
|----------|---------|-------|
| **Report_Templates_Pack.md** | Collection of report templates and formatting examples | Reference for creating new reports and summaries |

## How to Use

1. Review the template file for structure and formatting examples
2. Copy the relevant template section
3. Adapt it for your specific report or document
4. Save in the appropriate location (e.g., docs/ for reference materials, or docs/01_Project_Documentation/ for official documents)

## Creating New Project Documents

For official project documentation (Charter, BRD, Specs, etc.), see the authoring guidelines in [../01_Project_Documentation/README.md](../01_Project_Documentation/README.md).
